title: Tony Quiroga (Car and Driver)
description:
Tony Quiroga (@guaupants) is the Deputy Editor of Car and Driver Magazine. As one of the testers for Lightning Lap, he's one of the better drivers in the journalist field. He's also the only journalist to do instrumented testing of the Bugatti Chiron, and the speeds he hit were ridiculous. He tells us all about the g-forces of the Chiron, the thrills of wringing every tenth out at VIR, and how to keep '90s cars alive. 

Read 2021 Lightning Lap here: https://www.caranddriver.com/features/a35353597/lightning-lap-2021/

Watch his show, "Window Shoppers", here: https://www.youtube.com/user/CARandDRIVER

 

Re-shop your rates and you could save up to $1,055. Head to Policygenius.com to get started right now.

https://www.policygenius.com

https://www.keeps.com/tire


 

Goodguys Rod & Custom Association is kicking off car show season with its first event of the year at Texas Motor Speedway this weekend, March 12-14th. Go to good-guys.com to find tickets and more information about the show.

https://good-guys.com/slsn-spectator
 


https://www.tradecraftfarms.com

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (tony quiroga)
